<!-- BEGIN_AUTOGENERATED -->

# UnlessGuard Node Formatting

Represents an `unless` guard used in pattern matching (i.e. `in pattern unless guard`)

<!-- END_AUTOGENERATED -->

## Formats

Before:

```ruby
case ob
in { foo: bar } unless nil
end
```

After:

```ruby
case ob
in { foo: bar } unless nil
end
```

## Formats recursively

Before:

```ruby
case ob
in { foo: bar } unless nil
  case ob.parent
  in { child: barchild } unless bar.present?
  end
end
```

After:

```ruby
case ob
in { foo: bar } unless nil
  case ob.parent
  in { child: barchild } unless bar.present?
  end
end
```
